name: mesh_get_subjects_by_pharmacological_action
description: Find MeSH (Medical Subject Heading) subjects with matching pharmacological actions.

query.description: Pharmacological action to search for in MeSH subjects

case_sensitive.description: Select True to perform a case-sensitive search for the pharmacological action query

exact_match.description: Select True to require an exact match for the pharmacological action query

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

total_matches.description: Total number of matching records found

total_returned_results.description: Number of results returned in this response

_tag.description: XML tag name of the record element

_text.description: Text content of the record element

pharmacological_actions.description: Pharmacological actions associated with the subject, separated by ' | '

key_concepts.description: Key concepts related to the subject, separated by ' | '

concept_synonyms.description: Synonyms for the subject concepts, separated by ' | '

subject_scope.description: Scope note or definition of the subject. If multiple, they are separated by ' | '

subject_hierarchy_tree_numbers.description: MeSH tree numbers indicating hierarchical classification. Parents have a prefix of the tree number, up to the last '.' character. If multiple tree numbers present, they are separated by ' | '

entry_last_revised_date.description: Year the entry was last revised

matched_fields.description: List of fields that matched the search query

case_sensitive.description: Whether the search was case-sensitive

exact_match.description: Whether exact matching was used

limit.description: Maximum number of results requested

name: drugbank_filter_drugs_by_name
description: Filter DrugBank records based on conditions applied to drug names. For example, find drugs whose names end with 'cillin' (penicillin antibiotics), contain 'mab', or are exactly 'Insulin'.

condition.description: The condition to apply for filtering.

value.description: The value to use with the condition (e.g., 'Aspirin' for 'starts_with'). Required for 'contains', 'starts_with', 'ends_with', and 'exact' conditions.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return.

total_matches.description: Total number of matching records found

total_returned_results.description: Number of results returned in this response

_tag.description: XML tag name of the record element

_text.description: Text content of the record element

applied_filter.description: Human-readable description of the filter that was applied

field.description: The field that was filtered on

condition.description: The filter condition that was applied

value.description: The value used for filtering (null for 'not_empty' and 'has_attribute' conditions)

limit.description: Maximum number of results requested
